page.title: 15GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: I like four square.A square divided into 4 is drawn.One child stands in each square.Bounce the ball (and hit it with your hands)to your friends.He can't hit it straight back to you - that is back-pass,and he would be out.The ball cannot bounce on the lines. By John,aged 9. French Skipping is played with a hoop of elastic.Two people stand inside the elastic and put it round their ankles.One person jumps inside the elastic,then outside.Then she jumps on both pieces.Whilst the person is jumping,the people inside the elastic say a rhyme;"In,Big Ben strikes ten,one,two,three,four,five,six,seven, eight,nine,ten,out". By Susi,aged 9.
